summary: Allows you to disenchant the dark brotherhood gloves and jester's gloves so you can learn the backstab enchantment.
descriptionHtml:
I was really fascinated by the enchantment to double backstab damage included on gloves of the dark brotherhood. So I allowed you to disenchant these and learn the enchantment yourself.

As per request on the Steam workshop, I have also allowed you to enchant necklaces and earrings with this enchantment.
author: Xabu1
